title: Film-Noir | Angel on My Shoulder (1946) Colorized Movie | Paul Muni, Anne Baxter | with subtitles

sources.title: Film-Noir | Angel on My Shoulder (1946) Colorized Movie | Paul Muni, Anne Baxter | with subtitles
sources.description:
Deceased gangster Eddie Kagel, is an-exact double for a living well-respected judge, Frederick Parker.  The Devil (aka Nick), arranges for a body swap. Eddie agrees to having his soul transferred to the judge's body, as it will give him a chance to avenge his death.

00:00:00 Full length movie - Title credits
00:01:37 Opening scene - Eddie is out of the slammer
00:05:03 Science class in Hell
00:16:57 Back to the real world
00:19:52 1940's ghost special effects
00:26:30 Eddie is the Judge
00:45:54 Fight scene
00:56:51 Crooked judge... but

Black & white version: https://youtu.be/pISjbjHfqC8
Director: Archie Mayo
Writers: Harry Segall, Roland Kibbee
Stars: Paul Muni, Anne Baxter, Claude Rains
Genres: Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Romance

This video is available with subtitles in more than 30 languages. Click on ⚙️ and choose your preferred language.
